\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{color}

\sloppy
\definecolor{lightgray}{gray}{0.5}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\begin{document}

    
    \begin{verbatim}
Ga=tf(10, [1 1]);
T1=0;
T2=5;
while(abs(T1-T2)>1e-7)
    T=(T1+T2)/2;

    Gz=c2d(Ga, T, 'zoh');
    Tz=feedback(Gz,1);
    r=pole(Tz);
    rm=max(abs(r));
    if(rm>=1)
        T2=T;
    else
        T1=T;
    end

end
\end{verbatim}



\end{document}
